AI Description: MEME Suite is a comprehensive and powerful set of tools for discovering and analyzing motifs in a collection of DNA or protein sequences. It enables users to perform motif-based sequence analysis, including motif discovery, motif enrichment analysis, motif scanning, and motif comparison.
Core Features: Motif Discovery In DNA Or Protein Sequences, Motif Enrichment Analysis, Motif Scanning, Motif Comparison, Statistical Analysis Of Motifs
General Tags: Bioinformatics, DNA Sequences, Protein Sequences, Motif Analysis
